""" UDF """

# Original SAS code:
# Auto-generated pyspark code:
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import DoubleType


@udf(returnType=DoubleType())
def cz_sas_br_t_aantal_uren(
    onderdeel_specifiek_code,
    behandeling_atl_afleveringen_br,
    prestatiecodelijst_nmr,
    prestatie_code,
) -> float:
    prestations_65 = [
        "1000",
        "1001",
        "1002",
        "1003",
        "1004",
        "1005",
        "1006",
        "1008",
        "1009",
        "1010",
        "1011",
        "1012",
        "1013",
        "1014",
        "1017",
        "1018",
        "1019",
        "1023",
        "1024",
        "1025",
        "1026",
        "1031",
        "1032",
        "1033",
        "1034",
        "1035",
        "1036",
        "1037",
        "1038",
        "1041",
        "1049",
        "1062",
        "1110",
        "1111",
        "1112",
        "1113",
        "1114",
        "1115",
        "1118",
    ]
    prestations_69 = ["1008", "1011"]
    res = (
        0.0
        if behandeling_atl_afleveringen_br is None
        else float(behandeling_atl_afleveringen_br)
    )
    if onderdeel_specifiek_code == "KZU":
        return res
    if prestatiecodelijst_nmr == 65 and prestatie_code in prestations_65:
        return res / 12
    if prestatiecodelijst_nmr == 69 and prestatie_code in prestations_69:
        return res
    return 0.0
